Bash(git merge feature/header-status-bar --no-ff -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Merge feature/header-status-bar: UI improvements and group linking

Features:
- Move status bar into purple header (title left, status right)
- Move assignment stats into header alongside status
- Status fade animation (300ms in, 2s out)
- Search and Add Guest on same row
- Developer mode setting to hide dev tools
- Guest group linking UI with visual feedback
- Unlink button (â›“ï¸â€ðŸ’¥) for grouped guests
- Group hover highlighting (green)
- Actions column moved to first position
- Combined group names from all member last names
- Dedicated Group Lines column for family indicators

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git merge feature/group-lines-overlay --no-ff -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Merge feature/group-lines-overlay: Add SVG bracket-style group connections

Features:
- SVG overlay draws bracket-style lines connecting group members
- Dots at each group member with horizontal line to vertical trunk
- Different colors for each group (red, orange, yellow, green, cyan, blue, violet, pink)
- Lines connect members even when not in adjacent rows
- Hover highlighting: highlighted group stays colored, others dim to gray
- Dynamic row position measurement handles variable row heights
- ResizeObserver ensures lines stay aligned when content changes

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
